Introduction To Machine Learning, RAU 2023

Course materials

Lecture 1: Introduction to Machine Learning, Questionnaire 1

Useful materials

Books

  1. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning - Bishop C. M, Springer, 2006
  2. Deep Learning-Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville, The MIT Press, 2016.

Online courses

  1. Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - Andrew NG’s online course, Stanford University.
  2. Machine learning - Konstantin Vorontsov’s course, Yandex School of Data Analysis.

Additional materials

  1. Machine learning - Konstantin Vorontsov’s course, Yandex School of Data Analysis.
  2. Machinelearning.ru - information resource dedicated to machine learning, pattern recognition and data mining.
